strings.string: Directory on the Server to import uploaded files from. Use config file data/private/conf/import_tools_manager.inc. Path is relative to Matrix installation location unless prefixed with '/'.
Maximum File Size of local file upload (In bytes, 0 = no limit)
Import Tool is not ready to use
Please set the import directory using config file data/private/conf/import_tools_manager.inc.
Directory on the Unix system to import processed HTML files from. Use config file data/private/conf/import_tools_manager.inc.
Select a file to import into the system
If this option is selected, the new site will be created under the asset selected above. If no 'Asset to import Under' has been selected, the new site will be created under the root.
Creating a separate CSS file for the page. This overrides the default setting in Import Tools Manager.
Checking this will create a page for any text that is found in the document before the first heading
If the above option is checked, the page will be named this
Attempt to remove Microsoft Word Tags
Selecting this option will generate well-formed HTML, but may affect the formatting of the document. It can also slow down the importing process.
You cannot import a file while deleting a file
Select a directory to import into the system
File Import Tool is not ready
Please set the file import directory using config file data/private/conf/import_tools_manager.inc.
Set to Yes to allow this file to be be served by the web server if it is Live and publicly readable.
Each asset will be linked to the selected parent using this link type.
These files are located under %s and they will be imported at once.
Local File Import can not be used since the Web Server does not have write permission on %s. Please contact the server administrator first.
Can not create a temp upload directory.
Error occurred during the file upload, %s.
Can not delete the temporary upload directory, %s.
Root asset for local fime import is not selected.
File Import failed to create "%s" asset under Assetid : %d
Directory on the Server to export files to. Path is relative to Matrix installation location unless prefixed with '/'.
The basename of the exported files
Hipo Job Import Assets From XML

Select the XML file or a tar file containing xml file and physical files to import Assets from. Structure should be as in example.xml
Note: Import of large number of assets should be performed by sysadmin using scripts. See manual for details.

Set the root parent asset of the assets to import. This option should only be used if there is just a single root node to specify. If there are multiple root nodes, these should be specified using the export tool.
Hipo Job Export Assets To XML

Export all assets underneath root node to target parent node. Design, permission, linking can be maintained only if all involved assets are exported together. Use More button to select multiple root nodes.
Note: Export of large number of assets should be performed by sysadmin using scripts. See manual for details.
links to target parent asset id
The locks on the Import Tools Manager are currently held by user #%s Only one user is allowed use of this screen at a time.
